void sevent::socket::SessionRegistry::setAllEventsHandler ( Session::allEventsHandler_t  allEventsHandler)

Set the all-events-handler.

This is forwarded to Session::setAllEventsHandler() when a new session is added.

The default is to keep Session::defaultAllEventsHandler().

Definition at line 45 of file SessionRegistry.cc.

void sevent::socket::SessionRegistry::setDisconnectHandler ( Session::disconnectHandler_t  disconnectHandler)

Set the disconnect handler.

This is forwarded to Session::setDisconnectHandler() when a new session is added.

The default handler removes the session from the registry. Custom handlers MUST remember to do the same.

Definition at line 52 of file SessionRegistry.cc.
